body_content.explanation: in a way that involves things happening or being done at the same time or speed:
examples: Dragonflies beat their two sets of wings synchronously.
The predator eggs hatch synchronously with the emergence of the wasp larvae.

body_content.explanation: with a teacher and students taking part in a lesson at the same time, either physically together in one place, or using the internet:
examples: Students can study synchronously or asynchronously.
Small-group and one-to-one teacher-learner interaction, both synchronously and asynchronously, forms part of this learning system.
